name: Cosmos (itch) (EastKoastGames)
description:
A short demo build for a game I'd like to expand and maybe make into an app game. Homage to the retro classics!

The only button you'll need is the SPACEBAR to propel forwards. The astronaut spins while idle so time those directions!

EastKoast Games
